body: @svarovski the task is for you now, follow [these guidelines](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). Don't hesitate to ask any technical questions right here
@svarovski The cost of this task is **30 mins** (this is exactly how much will be paid, not less not more), when the task is done
How to reproduce it? This test case (RtSearchITCase#canSearchForIssues) doesn't show any errors for me.
Yes, it doesn't show because search results in your case don't give any non-Unicode chars. Try to reproduce it in a unit test, without real connection to Github

@svarovski check this ["no obligations principle"](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles#no-obligations).. This task is on your name for at least 13 days. If you can't close it within the next 16 hours I'll have to assign someone else to it
Sorry, no time now. Please, assign someone else.

@svarovski it takes too long. Usually, we expect any task to be finished in less than a week. I'll assign someone else. Please stop working with it right now. See our [no obligations](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles#no-obligations) principle
